cause.description:
The Civitan International Research Center is the flagship project of Civitan International. This state-of-the-art Center at the University of Alabama at Birmingham brings together top scientific minds and the latest technology to creat innovative therapies and treatments for people with developmental disabilities. The research done here is sooo important that it affects 1 in 10 families world wide!
1. No child should suffer issolation due to their disabilities.
2. The fight and research done at the center is a universal one.
cause.mission: Provide services for an international clientele of individuals with special needs, while researchers and therapist from around the world come to learn and train in the newest breakthroughs.
cause.name: Civitan International Research Center
